footercontent:
Drinks Delivery Kenya

Drinks Delivery Kenya is an online liquor store in Nairobi offering free and fast alcohol delivery Nairobi. The following are some of the reasons that you might consider ordering from us in comparison to other online liquor stores in Kenya.


Convenience – Do you have a busy daily routine? Do you want to enjoy the luxury of staying home and buy drinks online in Kenya? Drinks Delivery Kenya comes to your rescue. You don’t have to spend time in the traffic, hoping from one whisky shop or wine shop to the other looking for favourite drink or queuing to be checked out while you can dial a delivery from your phone or laptop and wait for a knock at your door in 20 minutes.

Flexible Payment Methods – Have you ever been in that scenario when you need drinks but you don’t have cash? Gone are the days when such limitation used to keep you thirsty. You can buy alcohol online in Nairobi and have it delivered to your house then pay via Mpesa, Airtel Money, MasterCard credit card or debit card. How convenient is that? I guess it is worth a smile.

Flexible Means of Ordering – To order drinks online should be as easy as drinking it. We have an website where you can order drinks via WhatsApp, text messages, call, shopping cart, email or even buy alcohol online via our social media. You don’t need effort to order a drink but just a simple dial and have the drink finding your house.

Economical - With the current economy, anywhere you can save a coin or two will have a huge impact on your finances. As Drinks Delivery Kenya, we are aware of this too and that why we have introduced weekly offers, coupons, loyalty programs and discounts. Be a loyal client and stand a chance of paying less any time you dial a drink.

No minimum orders – It ain’t right to differentiate your customers by their financial capabilities. Do you want to purchase drinks online? Then don’t worry, we delivery a six pack of beer or even a single bottle of liquor. This is to ensure that alcohol delivery Kenya is a service for all.

Genuine and Original Drinks – We get our stock from licensed suppliers to ensure you get only authentic and legit drinks. With counterfeit products rocking in the market, we can’t risk our customers. That’s why deliver drinks certified by EABL drinks delivery.

Competitive Prices – We offer the best alcohol prices in the city across all online alcohol stores. This ensures that you get the same original drink at a lower price. Visit our website www.drinksdeliverykenya.co.ke to get the best price of alcoholic drinks in Kenya.

Huge Variety of Drinks – Drinks Delivery Kenya offers a wide inventory of drinks for you to choose from. Are you a selective drinker? Then don’t worry as we stock the rare alcohol from all corners of the globe like Port wines, Japanese whiskies, Canadian whiskies… Shop for alcohol online today to enjoy the drink of you dreams.

No Delivery Fee – How amazing is that? Yes, we offer free drinks delivery Nairobi. This will help you cut on the overall cost of the drink.

Fast Alcohol Delivery Services – Having been in the industry for long enough, we are conversant with roads and all the estates around Nairobi. This helps us in offering the fastest alcohol delivery Kenya. With this assurance, you can dial a drink in Nairobi whenever you feel thirsty and have the delivery in 20 minutes.

Deep Alcohol Knowledge – Could you be having guests but you ain’t sure what to buy for them? Are you holding a party or an event but you feel confused on which drinks to buy? Drinks Delivery Kenya personnel have deep alcohol knowledge that will make your event a success. Don’t do the guess work which might be expensive to you, buy wines and spirits online today to enjoy the convenience.

Late Night Alcohol Delivery – We have extended our working hours to midnight everyday with exception of weekends when we go way past that. This is in line with our vision to offer 24 hour alcohol delivery Nairobi.

Extra Services - Besides alcohol delivery, we offer other services like water, chasers, energy drinks, condoms, tumblers and ice cubes. Dial a delivery today to enjoy more services.

Comparison Shopping – Want to compare several drinks? It is quite difficult to do comparison in a local liquor store but with online wines and spirits this is a simple task. You will have all the information you need at your disposal hence easier to make your decisions.

Gifts Delivery – Do you want to gift your friend on that special day? Drinks Delivery Kenya offers gifts delivery. This are gift baskets aimed at special occasions and will include the drink of the targeted recipient plus some other things like chocolates, teddy bear, fresh juice, card … basically it can include anything you request of.


In conclusion, Drinks Delivery Kenya should be your best choice when it comes to dial a drink Kenya. We offer a wide range of drinks ranging from whisky, wine, champagne, vodka, tequila, liqueur, cognac, brandy, rum, gin, vermouth, bitters, aperitifs, energy drinks and chasers (sodas, fresh fruit juices, lime water, tonic water, soda water and water). Are you looking for whisky delivery Nairobi or wine delivery Nairobi? We are just a call a way to make it happen. Besides selling on retail, we also offer wines and spirit wholesale prices in Kenya.

metadescription: Drinks Delivery Kenya is an online liquor store located in Nairobi CBD. We offer alcohol delivery services. Among the drinks, we stock are whiskey, wines, cognac etc
footercontent:
DRINKS DELIVERY KENYA

We are an online liquor store located in Nairobi CBD. We offer alcohol delivery services in Nairobi and all the surrounding regions through a fleet of motorbikes within 10 minutes to 30 minutes. We also deliver to other parts of Kenya and the East African region through courier services within 24 hours.

Why Buy Alcohol Online In Kenya?

There are so many reasons that necessitate online shopping of alcoholic drinks in Kenya but the major ones are fast alcohol delivery services, competitive alcohol prices, convenient payment methods, no minimum orders, great offers, gift delivery, a wide variety of alcohol, flexible means of ordering and almost 24 hours alcohol delivery in Nairobi. Drinks Delivery Kenya is the most reliable, price competitive and convenient way to buy wines, spirits, beers, chasers, cigarettes and condoms online.

How To Buy Drinks Online

- Visit www.drinksdeliverykenya.co.ke to explore our collection or call 0714798820 to make any inquiries

- Choose your favourite drinks and them to the shopping cart, adjust the number of bottles and then proceed to the checkout where you will fill the information about your location and choose your payment method

- You may also choose to order via text or WhatsApp where you only input the location details. Other options of ordering alcohol online include social media platforms (Facebook, Twitter and Instagram) and email

- One of our clerks will call you to confirm the order and your location and dispatch it immediately

- We deliver drinks in all areas around Nairobi between 10 minutes to 30 minutes

- Upon receiving your order, you will make payment using your preferred payment method

Types Of Alcohol In Kenya

1. Wines In Kenya

They are the most consumed alcoholic drinks in Kenya because they are used for refreshments, to pair with food or intoxication. Wines are made from the fermentation of grapes’ juice. The colour of the grape and the method of production affects types of wines produced, wine prices in Kenya and alcoholic content of the wines produced. Visit our online wine store to order wines online and enjoy fast wine delivery in Nairobi. The popular types of wines in Kenya are sweet red wines, sweet white wines, dry red wines, dry white wines, rose wines, port wines, champagnes, sparkling wines, prosecco wines, vermouth wines and fortified wines. Wines are categorised according to the colour of the grapes used, the name of the grape used, method of production utilized. Wines can also be categorised depending on how sweet or dry they are. The following are the major categories of wines in Kenya.

Types Of Wines In Kenya

  • Sweet red wines
  • Dry red wines
  • Sweet white wines
  • Dry white wines
  • Rose wines
  • Sparkling wines
  • Champagnes
  • Prosecco wines
  • Port wines
  • Fortified wines
  • Vermouth wines
  • Non-alcoholic wines
  • South African wines


2. Whiskeys In Kenya

Whiskies are made from distilling fermented grains like barley, rye, wheat and corn. This dark-coloured liquid is aged in wood barrels for a minimum of three years. The wood used to age whisky, the number of years aged, the grains used in production, the country from which the whisky is produced and the method of production used result to the different whiskey brands in Kenya and also affects the whiskey prices in Kenya. The popular types of whiskeys that you will find in our whisky store are single malt whisky, Irish whiskeys, blended whisky, Japanese whisky, bourbon whiskey, Tennessee whiskey and Canadian whisky. Visit our online liquor store today to explore our whisky collection and enjoy free whisky delivery in Nairobi. Whiskeys can be categorised depending on the country in which they are produced, the style of production utilized and the type of grains used in production. This results in so many categories of whiskeys but the following are the most popular types of whiskeys in Kenya.

Types Of Whiskeys In Kenya

  • Single Malt Whisky
  • Blended Scotch Whisky
  • Irish Whiskeys
  • Japanese Whisky
  • Bourbon & Tennessee Whiskeys
  • Canadian Whisky
  • Indian Whisky


3. Vodkas In Kenya

They are categorised as clear spirits. These are distilled spirits that are mostly made from potatoes although some are made from grapes or corn. To improve their quality, they are distilled severally. Vodkas have an origin of Poland and Russia where they were originally used for medicinal purposes. Unlike other types of alcohol, vodkas have so many flavours although the originals vodka of every brand is not flavoured. One particular vodka brand can have up to 12 flavours. Visit our online wines and spirits store to explore vodka brands in Kenya and their prices. The three countries that are popular with production of vodka are Poland, Russia and Sweden, however, the are other countries producing vodka nowadays.

Types Of Vodka In Kenya

  • Plain vodka
  • Flavoured vodka
  • Fruit vodka

4. Beers In Kenya

These are the most popular alcoholic drinks in the clubs due to their low alcohol content, affordable prices and their availability in both bottles and cans. Most of the beers are EABL products, however, there are a few of them that are international brands. Beers are made from the fermentation of barley. Some of them are sweetened with sugars while some like White Cap, Balozi and Summit Malt have no added sugar. Some of them have zero alcohol content. Do you want to buy beers online? Visit our online wines and spirits store in Nairobi and explore our collection of local and imported beers in Kenya at the best beer prices.

Types Of Beer In Kenya

  • Cider
  • Lager
  • Malt
  • Lite
  • Draught
  • Alcopops

5. Brandy In Kenya

These are spirits that are made from distilling wine. Just like whisky, they are aged in wooden barrels and have alcoholic content ranging from 35 % to 60%. There is a special way of naming Brandies depending on the number of years they have been aged. VS are those brandies that are aged for no less than 3 years, VSOP are those brandies that are aged for no less than 5 years while XO are those brandies that are aged for no less than 6 years. To improve the taste of the various categories of brandies, super-ged brandies that span over 100 years are added in the barrel. There are only a few types of brandy in Kenya. These are Viceroy, JP Chenet, KWV, Bardinet, Three Barrels, Richot, Kyron Brandy, Don Montego and Napoleon. Brandy are classified according to their age. Unlike Cognacs that have strict rules when it comes to the grapes utilized, brandies have a lot of flexibility in selecting the grapes to use and they can be produced in any region in the world.

Types Of Cognac In Kenya

  • VS – Very Special
  • VSOP – Very Superior Old Pale
  • XO – Extra Old
  • Hors d'âge – high quality beyond the official age

6. Cognacs In Kenya

These are brandies that are only produced in the Cognac region in France. Cognacs are high-quality drinks and are often compared with expensive whiskeys. Cognacs must be distilled twice and aged for a minimum of two years in French oak barrels. The factors that make Cognac spirits to stand out among other types of spirits in Kenya are the fancy bottle design and also the high-quality mature drink that is aged for more than the legal years and then blended to taste by highly qualified and experienced master distillers. Order your Cognac online today and pleasure in convenient Cognac delivery in Nairobi. Do you fancy Cognacs? Stock your liquor cabinet from our wide variety of cognac brands and prices in Kenya like Remy Martins, Martell, Hennessy, Courvoisier, Camus, Bisquit and Meukow. Since Cognacs are a small branch of brandy, they have the same way of classifying their drinks according to their age.

Types Of Cognac In Kenya

  • VS – Very Special
  • VSOP – Very Superior Old Pale
  • XO – Extra Old
  • Hors d'âge – high quality beyond the official age

7. Rums In Kenya

These are dark spirits that have origin in the Caribbean countries. They are made from sugar can molasses or sugar cane juice. There are several types of rums in Kenya but the most ones are the white rum, dark rum and golden rum. The White rums are normally used in cocktails while the dark rum and golden rums are drank neat or on the rocks. Some people also take the gold rum and dark rums with chasers. Visit our online liquor store to order and enjoy wide varieties of rum brands and prices in Kenya plus reliable rum delivery in Nairobi.

Types Of Rum In Kenya

  • Dark rums
  • Flavoured rums
  • Gold rum
  • Light rums
  • Overproof rums
  • Premium rums
  • Spiced rums

8. Gins In Kenya

These are clear spirits that are made by re-distilling with juniper berries. They are commonly used in cocktails or enjoyed by mixing with tonic water. There are so many styles of gin but they revolve around juniper berries and then flavoured with herbs, fruits, floral, spices or a combination of the four options. Order gin online today for reliable gin delivery in Nairobi and take delight in our huge collection. Some of the popular gin brands and prices in Kenya are Gilbey’s, Gordon’s, Bombay Sapphire, Hendrick’s, Tanqueray, 6th Sense, New Amsterdam, Seagram’s and Beefeater.

Types Of gin In Kenya

  • London Dry Gin
  • Plymouth
  • Navy Strength
  • New Wave
  • Old Tom
  • Genever
  • Grape Based Gin
  • Flavoured Gin
  • Aged Gin

9. Tequilas In Kenya

These are distilled spirits that are produced in Mexico from a plant blue agave. They are known to be strong drinks, therefore, they are used in cocktails or drank as shots or served with salt or lime. However, in Mexico tequila are normally drank neat. Tequila can only be produced in some particular cities in Mexico with an alcoholic content between 35% and 55%. Do you need a drink to knock you down or to drown your worries? Visit our online liquor store and enjoy wide varieties of tequila brands and prices in Kenya in addition to free and fast tequila delivery in Nairobi.

Types Of Tequila In Kenya

  • Reposado
  • Blanco
  • Anejo
  • Extra Anejo

10. Liqueurs In Kenya

These are distilled spirits that are added flavours like sugars, herbs, nuts or spices. In most cases, they are served before or after dessert. Unlike the other spirits, they are not aged and have alcoholic content ranging from 15% to 55%. The following are the types of liqueur available in Kenya;

Types Of Liqueurs In Kenya

  • Cream liqueurs
  • Crème liqueurs
  • Flower liqueurs
  • Fruit liqueurs
  • Herbal liqueurs
  • Honey liqueurs
  • Nut-flavored liqueurs
  • Whisky liqueurs
  • Berry liqueurs
  • Chocolate liqueurs
  • Coffee liqueurs
